definition.procedurexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block deletable="false" type="event_trigger" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_binary_ops"><field name="OP">AND</field><value name="A"><block type="java_code_get"><field name="CODE">world != null</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="world_data_isremote"/></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="return_string"><value name="return"><block type="procedure_retval_string"><field name="procedure">Jingyanshuhuoqumiaoshu</field></block></value></block></statement><next><block type="return_string"><value name="return"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT"/></block></value></block></next></block></next></block><block type="return_string" x="84" y="310"><value name="return"><block type="logic_ternary_op"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" mark="false"/><value name="condition"><block type="logic_negate"><value name="BOOL"><block type="item_nbt_logic_get"><value name="item"><block type="itemstack_to_mcitem"/></value><value name="tagName"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">jingyanshu</field></block></value></block></value></block></value><value name="THEN"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">§6手持右键获取其中知识</field></block></value><value name="ELSE"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">§c该经验书已被你学习</field></block></value></block></value></block></xml>
